Event.Name: ASME Fluids Engineering Division Summer Meeting
Event.Description: You are cordially invited to participate in the ASME 2018 Fluids Engineering Division Summer Meeting (FEDSM2018). The program of FEDSM2018 will include technical paper sessions, plenary lectures, committee meetings and social events. FEDSM is involved in all areas of fluid mechanics, encompassing both fundamental as well as applications, to all types of devices, processes and machines involving fluid flows. Join us in Montreal, Quebec Canada for what will surely be an exciting conference!

AdditionalInformation.Name: Guest Room Reservation Cut Off Date
